backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs for static business-awareness page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layer defining design tokens, color variables, and dark-mode overrides for the project.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the BusinessAwarenessLanding component as the main app view.
frontend/src/components/business-awarene: Reusable card component rendering a titled section with icon, description, and styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and identity management logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for unused backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining navy theme tokens, typography, and utility extensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root app.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessAwarenessLand: Main landing page with header, sticky nav, and five business-topic sections using TopicCard components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a static singleâ€‘page site build, existing feature requirements, and one pending feature request.
